long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Scrape unlimited leads from Apollo.io.

‚úÖ HOW DOES IT WORK?

Export people searches from Apollo Search result to CSV.

Find business emails using scraping and email finder algorithms.

Clean Data: Automatically clean names, job titles and company names. remove all special characters, emojis, all caps, LTD. LLC. and other company denominations.

üî• FEATURES

- Export Apollo People Search result to CSV with professional emails.
- Verified B2B emails that you can trust.
- Available on Total, Net New and Saved tab.
- Save leads to contacts list.
- Manage your leads and create lists.

‚ùì FAQ

You can choose not to use Apollo email credit. In this scenario, you will use NioLeads finder credit to find the email address, which is faster and safer.

If you are an Apollo free user, your search is limited to 5 pages. You can use Net new or Saved tab to export up to 100 pages 2500 leads.

Please note that you can only export people with emails, but cannot export company data or export people without emails.

üëç TRY FOR FREE

Hit the ground running with NioLeads's free trial that provides you access to our Chrome Extension and 10 email credits to enjoy.

üîí PRIVACY

For more info: https://nioleads.com/privacy

Any question? Drop us a line at help@nioleads.com!
